column5:
I feel you, I also fell in love with a girl once,and I kinda share with you some events, Let me tell you how I overcame that.

Firstly, accept that, no matter what the reasons and the circumestances were,that haapend and nothing would change.

Second, forget about here! 
It so hard, but day after another,it will work
I' d say Do not block here, feel free to delete the conversation in case it reminds you of her.

 Finally, keep in mind that you will meet a girl whom you can trust, that could take time, but it woths!
